author: mike.monkeybiter
long_description:
Built upon pvp_toggle by Impulse.
Allow players to set their own ability to hurt or be hurt in PvP, by chat commands or by pressure pads.
Player's nametag colour changes to reflect status. 
Players default to pvp off, and in that state they can't be hurt by others.

Important, If using protectors mod, disable protection against PvP in minetest.conf using protector_pvp = false
name: pvp_control
short_description: Allow players to set their own ability to hurt or be hurt in PvP, by chat command or by pressure pads. Nametag colour changes to reflect status.
title: PvP Control
